title: Game stuck zoomed in

embed.description: Store photos and docs online. Access them from any PC, Mac or phone. Create and work together on Word, Excel or PowerPoint documents.

body: When I went click ready, I chose my character and stuff, and when game entered loading mode, so I went to explorer to search something up, when I opened it back up it was stuck. I tried restarting my laptop, settings, league of legend settings, zooming out and in, and closing out my game. when ever I play game it is stuck like this. HELP ME

replies.body:
I wasn't able to load the image, but it sounds like your config could be corrupt and not loading your resolution in-game properly.  A config reset might help!

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know everything is okay with that!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0qgV0Uuf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-19T23:48:27.468+0000)
>

> Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 
> 
> Let me know everything is okay with that!

Thanks this problem happened to me today and your solution fixed it for me, Thanks!

Its not working i have the same problem while in queue the game just zoom in and starts to move around
Also It only happens after I click ready and go into a match, and I can still click stuff its just I'm stuck zoomed.

The same thing happens to me after each patch.

As far as I can tell, it has something to do with the borderless setting.

For me, switching to full screen then back to borderless while in game tends to solve the problem.
also clicking the button tab does nothing
